name: "feral" metroidvania early beta
description:
please read the beta launch devlog before playing. or don't.

controls

  • walk - arrow keys
  • jump - spacebar - hold longer for higher jump
  • attack - q - holding an arrow key direction (up and down) will attack in that direction. 
  • dash - w
  • heal - hold e without pressing left or right while you have some rage. having more rage will heal faster.
  • boomerang attack - hold e, then hold left or right. having more rage will cause the attack to attack faster.
  • map - hold m to pull up a map of the current area. 

Saving

game saves automatically whenever you touch a dragon fountain statue or you die. bosses will stay dead forever, and levers will stay flipped, but normal enemies respawn whenever the game saves. you can continue a previous save using the start button on the start menu, or you can restart with the restart button on the start menu.
